    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<string>
    #define mod 1000000007
    using namespace std;
    typedef long long int ll;
    int main()
    {
        ll p,t,n,k,m;
        cin>>p;
        while(p--)
        {
            cin>>n>>k>>m;
            t=0;
            while(n<=m/k)
            {
                n*=k;
                t++;
            }
            cout<<t<<'\n';
        }
        return 0;
    }
